title: Research Assistant
description:
• Migrated the site from Jekyll to Next.js 14 using TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, built a responsive UI, and converted YAML content to typed JSON,
resulting in faster page loads and easier content management
• Implemented structured, filterable Team, News, and Publications sections with dynamic lists using React and SQL Server, which streamlined content
discovery for users
• Set up GitHub-to-Vercel CI/CD pipeline, enforced ESLint rules, and enabled Vercel Analytics, ensuring automated deployments, consistent code
quality, and visibility into site performance

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
• Automated Magento Open Source installation on Ubuntu using Ansible and configured SMTP for custom domain emails, reducing deployment time
by 75%.
• Integrated a mobile-friendly theme, updated user content, and helped customers create configurable product listings improving inventory management
efficiency by 40%.
• Integrated a secure payment gateway and SEO best practices to improve search engine visibility and drive organic traffic.

title: Software Developer Intern
description:
• Developed and deployed a machine learning system using Linear Regression algorithms to analyze historical real estate data, achieving 92% prediction
accuracy and reducing estimation time by 75%.
• Engineered robust data preprocessing pipelines with outlier detection and feature engineering, improving model performance by 38%.
• Architected a scalable Flask RESTful API with Redis caching and MySQL integration, delivering real-time price predictions that maintained
sub-second response times during peak traffic periods
